name: Jan Kybic
content: Jan Kybic home page Jan Kybic Home page Home Available positions CV Contacts & agenda Funding Personal Publications Research Students & Collaborators Teaching I am a Full Professor in the Department of Cybernetics of the Faculty of Electrical Engineering of the Czech Technical University. I am a head of a small Biomedical Imaging Algorithms (BIA) group. My research mainly involves algorithms for medical and biological image processing. I am always looking for new collaborations and new projects, so if you have some interesting image data you need to analyze, feel free to contact me. I am a member of the Scientific Council of the FEE CTU, the Scientific Council of FI Masaryk University, and the Scientific Council of the Charles University. I am a head of the master study programme Medical electronics and bioinformatics and of the Phd programme Bioengineering. News and messages I am one of the mentors for the CTU international postdoc programme, which has just been open. (30-Jun-2025) The diploma thesis of Lucie BoroviÄkovÃ¡ was awarded the price at a student conference Trends in the development of ultrasound imaging systems. Our article Tichy et al: Automatic caries detection in bitewing radiographs: part II—-experimental evaluation. was accepted to Clinical Oral Investigation. (23-Jan-2024) Older news I am also on Twitter as @JanKybic. Page last modified Wed Jul 30 10:22:41 2025. Created by rest2web. Website template by Arcsin (modified)
